actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-306.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #243 (397-2).
Placed on Calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, in lieu of S. 846.
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-497.
House agreed to conference report, roll call #441 (401-1).

official_title: An Act to extend certain authorities of the Secretary of the Interior with respect to water resources research and saline water conversion programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-497) Amends the Water Resources Research Act and the Saline Water Conversion Act to extend the authority of the Secretary of the Interior with respect to specified water resources programs. Authorizes $21,950,000 to be appropriated for fiscal year 1978 for purposes of the Saline Water Conversion Act and the Water Resources Research Act. Authorizes and directs the Secretary to operate and maintain desalting plants utilizing membrane and phase change desalting processes at no more than four locations in the United States. Authorizes the appropriation of $40,000,000 for the construction of such plants, and such sums as are necessary for the operating expenses of such plants.

titles.title: Water Resources Research and Technology Development Act
A bill to extend certain authorities of the Secretary of the Interior with respect to water resources research and saline water conversion programs.
An Act to extend certain authorities of the Secretary of the Interior with respect to water resources research and saline water conversion programs, and for other purposes.
